body_html:
Thanks for your efforts @rryan.

Slightly off topic: I'm actually using tf.abs( tf.contrib.signal.stft( x ) ).
Since complex numbers are a combination of absolute value and "argument":
Can this be rewritten as a single op which doesn't require complex numbers?
Maybe this would also be somewhat more battery efficient?

body:
Thanks for your efforts @rryan.

Slightly off topic: I'm actually using `tf.abs( tf.contrib.signal.stft( x ) )`.
Since complex numbers are a combination of absolute value and "argument":
Can this be rewritten as a single op which doesn't require complex numbers?
Maybe this would also be somewhat more battery efficient?
